access_key.description: [required*] Specify access key for selected provider.

api_base.description: [optional*] Specify the api base for selected provider. Leave it blank if you want to use default api base.

devchat.Provider.devchat.markdownDescription: Specify the properties for devchat provider.

access_key.description: [required*] Specify access key for selected provider.

api_base.description: [optional*] Specify the api base for selected provider. Leave it blank if you want to use default api base.

devchat.Provider.openai.markdownDescription: Specify the properties for openai provider.

provider.description: [required*] Specify which provider host this llm model

temperature.description: [optional*] What sampling temperature to use, between 0 and 2. Higher values like 0.8 will make the output more random, while lower values like 0.2 will make it more focused and deterministic.

max_tokens.description:
[optional*] The maximum number of tokens to generate in the chat completion.
The total length of input tokens and generated tokens is limited by the model's context length. Example Python code for counting tokens.

max_input_tokens.description: [optional*] Maximum text length for input to AI.

presence_penalty.description: [optional*] Number between -2.0 and 2.0. Positive values penalize new tokens based on whether they appear in the text so far, increasing the model's likelihood to talk about new topics.

frequency_penalty.description: [optional*] Number between -2.0 and 2.0. Positive values penalize new tokens based on their existing frequency in the text so far, decreasing the model's likelihood to repeat the same line verbatim.

DevChat.maxLogCount.description: Limit the number of prompts in the chat view.

DevChat.PythonForChat.description: Which Python interpreter to use with DevChat?

DevChat.PythonForCommands.description: Path to the Python virtual environment for AskCode.

scripts.pretest: npm run compile-tests && npm run compile && npm run lint
scripts.build: webpack --config webpack.config.js && cd ./gui && yarn && yarn vscode
scripts.idea: webpack --config webpack.idea.config.js &&  mv dist/main.js dist/main.html ../devchat-intellij/src/main/resources/static && echo '🎆done'
